answer verification.from sentence: From , we can see that the answer verification makes a great contribution to the over all improvement , which confirms our hypothesis that cross - passage answer verification is useful for the multi-passage MRC .

has.from sentence: For the ablation of the content model , we analyze that it will not only affect the content score itself , but also violate the verification model since the content probabilities are necessary for the answer representation , which will be further analyzed in Section 4.3 .

great benefits.from sentence: Another discovery is that jointly training the three models can provide great benefits , which shows that the three tasks are actually closely related and can boost each other with shared representations at bottom layers .

improvement.from sentence: At last , comparing our method with the baseline , we achieve an improvement of nearly 3 points without the yes / no classification .
